item.title: How to contribute to open source project
item.description: So you want to contribute to some open source project which is hosted on git[hub,lab] or some other git website. Here is all you want to do. Fork the repository Create a personal fork. On github, visit the project repository and hit fork. It will fork the project in your personal account. Clone it Clone it in your local machine so you can work on it. Remember you are cloning the fork, and not the original project.
